com.sensoro.cloud

类 BackgroundPowerSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.cloud.BackgroundPowerSaver

  • public class BackgroundPowerSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    Create an instance of this class and hold a reference to it in your Application, it will improve battery life. While SDK will scan beacons more difficult when app is in the background because BackgroundPowerSaver is implemented by slowing down scans. Note: You can adjust your app to what you want by calling SensoroManager.setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod(long) (long)} and SensoroManager.setBackgroundScanPeriod(long) (long)}.
